long_description: The soft acrylic and wool warmth, and simple elegance, of the prAna Nadia Dress is perfect for gallery hopping or relaxing on a cafe patio plotting your next mountain adventure with friends. Fabric blend combines the natural warmth and durability of wool with the easy care and softness of acrylic. Crossover V-neckline; slight gathering at side seams flatters the figure. Elbow-length sleeves make the prAna Nadia Dress ideal for warm or cool weather. Closeout.
short_description: The soft acrylic and wool warmth, and simple elegance, of the prAna Nadia Dress is perfect for gallery hopping or relaxing on a cafe patio plotting your next mountain adventure with friends.
